title: Loving Hut - North Park Uptown
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Part of international chain of vegan food restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan dessert. Each location is individual family owned and operated. This one is in the 7 Eleven shopping plaza with lot parking. Small but with plenty of tables, brightly lit with large front windows.
